thread.title: LIVE | Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine looks ahead to Sunday's game
thread.title_full: LIVE | Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine looks ahead to Sunday's game

title: LIVE | Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine looks ahead to Sunday's game
text:
LIVE | Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine looks ahead to Sunday's game The team's head coach speaks about the matchup against the Denver Broncos at 12:25 p.m. Post to Facebook LIVE | Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine looks ahead to Sunday's game The team's head coach speaks about the matchup against the Denver Broncos at 12:25 p.m.  //on.wkyc.com/1LvLWHb   Join the Conversation To   LIVE | Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine looks ahead to Sunday's game 12 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 The team's head coach speaks about the matchup against the Denver Broncos at 12:25 p.m. Cleveland Browns coach Mike Pettine thought Tramon Williams was offsides on the final play against San Diego. (Photo: Ken Blaze-USA TODAY Sports) 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
BEREA-- Cleveland Browns' head coach Mike Pettine will look ahead to Sunday's matchup against the Denver Broncos at a press conference Thursday afternoon. 
Our WKYC Sports team will be there. 
Catch their live updates with Pettine's comments below (mobile users, CLICK HERE ) starting around 12:25 p.m., and join in the conversation by using #3Browns. 
READ | Browns expect to see Peyton Manning at his best 
Browns' quarterback Josh McCown, playing with a sore ankle after a record-setting game last week, will face off against five-time league MVP quarterback Peyton Manning. 
Vote in the poll below to share your thoughts on who will have the better game (mobile users, CLICK HERE to vote). 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://on.wkyc.com/1LvLWHb TOP VIDEOS
